# peacock-design-tokens

Peacock Design Tokens are a set of design tokens that are used to build the UI components of the Peacock Design System.

```css
/* -------------------------------------------
 *  Autogenerated by ⛋ Terrazzo. DO NOT EDIT!
 * ------------------------------------------- */
```
